caption.p: ( a) Asymmetric unit of PROG-CNA, showing C-H···π and C-H···O hydrogen bonds (blue and red dashed lines). ( b) Hydrogen-bonded pattern of PROG-CNA. ( c) Packing diagram of PROG-CNA along the a axis. Displacement ellipsoids are drawn at 30% probability. Symmetry codes: A: −1 + X, +Y, +Z; B: −1/2 + X, 3/2 − Y, 1 − Z; C: 3/2 − X, 1 − Y, −1/2 + Z. ( d) View of the Hirshfeld surface around the CNA molecule, the surface being colored according to the electron density (e/Å 3).
